children.name: UserAssits
children.description: GUI-based programs launched from the desktop, All values are ROT-13 encoded
children.time: Last run time (UTC), focus time in ms, last write time for the key is likely the first time a program was executed

children.name: Windows 10 Timeline
children.description: records recently used applications and files in a timeline

children.name: Background activity moderator (BAM)
children.description: records recently used applications and files in a timeline

children.name: Desktop activity moderator (DAM)
children.description: records recently used applications and files in a timeline

children.name: System Resource Usage Monitor(SRUM)
children.description: Records 30 to 60 days of historical system performance

children.name: Jump lists
children.description: https://dfir.to/EZjumpList
children.time: First time executed = creation time, last time executed of application w/file open = modification time

children.name: Last-Visited MRU
children.description: Tracks the specific executable used by an application to open the files

children.name: Prefetch
children.description: Increases performance of a system by pre-loading code pages of commonly used applications. Cache Manager monitors all files and directories referenced for each, disable on system with SSD
children.time: Date created = first executed, Date modified = last executed

children.name: RecentApps
children.description: Track execution of GUI based application and recent file opened by that application
children.time: LastaccessTIme = last execution time in UTC

children.name: Last-Visited MRU
children.description: Tracks the specific executable used by an application to open the files

children.name: IE|Edge file://
children.description: The history also records local and remote (via network shares) does not mean the file was opened in browser

children.name: Thumbcache
children.description: Thumbnails of pictures, office documents, and folders

children.name: Thumbs.db
children.description: Thumbnails of pictures, office documents, and folders
children.path: Automatically created anywhere and accessed via a UNC Path(local or remote)

children.name: Search – WordWheelQuery
children.description: Stores user search history for explorer and start menu

children.name: Typed path
children.description: The path typed in the explorer address bar.

children.name: shimcache
children.description: Any executable run on the Windows system could be found in this key
children.time: Last modified date of the PE

children.name: Amcache.hve
children.description: Program execution, {Volume guid} is paired up with the mountedevices key found in system\mounteddevices. Value names are in hex (0:17,100,101) paired to a name
children.time: First Run Time = Last Modification Time of Key

children.name: Network History
children.description: Identify networks that the computer has been connected to

children.name: WLAN Event Log
children.description: Identify networks that the computer has been connected to

children.name: Network shares evt
children.description: Event ID 5140 - 5145

children.name: Network shares
children.description: List open network shares on the computer, and flags and configuration settings. Look for and identify possible offline caching

children.name: Network profile key - first and last time connection
children.description: Identify the type of network the computer was connected to, will store the SSID of previous wireless, 0x47 wireless, 0x06 wired, 0x17 broadband

children.name: Last-Visited MRU
children.description: Tracks the specific executable used by an application to open the files

children.name: IE|Edge file://
children.description: The history also records local and remote (via network shares) does not mean the file was opened in browser

children.name: Shortcut (LNK)
children.description: last drive letter of the USB

children.name: Jump lists
children.description: https://dfir.to/EZjumpList
children.time: First time executed = creation time, last time executed of application w/file open = modification time

children.name: Open/Save MRU
children.description: tracks files that have been opened or saved within a Windows shell dialog box

children.name: Prefetch
children.description: Increases performance of a system by pre-loading code pages of commonly used applications. Cache Manager monitors all files and directories referenced for each, disable on system with SSD
children.time: Date created = first executed, Date modified = last executed

children.name: Office Recent Files
children.description: MS Office programs will track their own Recent Files

children.name: Office reading location
children.description: MS Office programs will track their own Recent Files

children.name: Shell Bags
children.description: Which folders were accessed on the local machine, the network, and/or removable devices

children.name: Shell Bags (Explore)
children.description: Which folders were accessed on the local machine, the network, and/or removable devices

children.name: Recent docs
children.description: Registry Key that will track the last files and folders opened and is used to populate data in “Recent” menus of the Start menu, It the MRUlist that is used to create the order in which files are opened.

children.name: last login
children.description: local account of the system

children.name: RDP usage
children.description: RDP logons, will also contain info on source hostname, Event ID 4778 and 4779

children.name: Authentication Events
children.description: 4776: Successful/Failed account authentication

children.name: Success/Fail Logons
children.description: 4624 success, 4634 |4647 logoff

children.name: User of USB device
children.description: Find User that used the Unique USB Device. Look for GUID from SYSTEM\MountedDevices

children.name: PNP Events
children.description: Event ID: 20001 – Plug and Play driver install attempted

children.name: Volume serial number
children.description: Discover the Volume Serial Number

children.name: Drive letter and volume name
children.description: last drive letter of the USB

children.name: Shortcut (LNK)
children.description: last drive letter of the USB

children.name: Open/Save MRU
children.description: tracks files that have been opened or saved within a Windows shell dialog box

children.name: Shadow copy
children.description: Backup of previous vesion of the system

children.name: Hibernation files
children.description: Compressed RAM image

children.name: Page files
children.description: Compressed RAM image

children.name: swap files
children.description: Compressed RAM image

children.name: memory dump files
children.description: RAM dump image

children.name: WMI databse
children.Description: objects.data = object managed by WMI, index.btr = binary tree index, Mapping* = correlated data

children.name: Service
children.Description: if start key is 0x02 it will start at boot

children.name: Current control set
children.Description: Information about which currentcontrolset is currently in use

children.name: NTFS last access time on/off
children.Description: Disabled means the last access time will not be recorded in the NTFS file system. It means that you will not be able to see when data was last accessed by the system.

children.name: Network interfaces
children.Description: Network interface cards, list network interfaces of the computer and allows you to tie machine to network activity.
